subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Chris Horner, who beat the Tour de France leader, Vincenzo Nibali, to win the 2013 Vuelta a España at age 41, finished 29th in Wednesday’s stage. Rafal Majka won it.
snippet: Chris Horner, who beat the Tour de France leader, Vincenzo Nibali, to win the 2013 Vuelta a España at age 41, finished 29th in Wednesday’s stage. Rafal Majka won it.
